1542861175_1PkVAeJswTgCVG4MN6BZG7YdWpzgm.body: Yes. Unfortunately jew-torba fucked it up

I used to be prominent as hell on gab. But Nekololi's right, the centralized nature of the site made it pozzed by design.

Decentralized social media can't be cucked the way gab was. 

Maybe some form of social media could use a form of bridge between ZeroMe and activitypub, That'd be cool. Or even activitypub on ZeroNet. 

Point is, there are ways to make decentralized social media. Let's make it happen.
